mnemonic: 杯 = 木 (wood) + 不 (not). A wooden vessel that's 'not' empty — a cup ready to be filled.

mnemonicData.story: A wooden vessel waits on the table for tea service.

mnemonic: 电 (electricity) + 脑 (brain). An electric brain — a computer!

mnemonicData.story: An electric brain handles every task on the desk.

mnemonic: 电 (electricity) + 视 (to view). Electric viewing — television!

mnemonicData.story: Electric images bring distant scenes into the room.

mnemonic: 电 (electricity) + 影 (shadow/image). Electric shadows projected on a screen — movies!

mnemonicData.story: Electric shadows flicker across a theater wall.

mnemonic: 东 (east) + 西 (west). From east to west, everything in between — stuff/things.

mnemonicData.story: From east to west, everything in between gets packed together.

mnemonic: 对 (correct) + 不 (not) + 起 (rise). Can't rise to what's correct — I'm sorry.

mnemonicData.story: Unable to rise to what is right, you offer an apology.

mnemonic: 多 (many) + 少 (few). How much is it — many or few?

mnemonicData.story: You compare abundance and scarcity to ask for quantity.

mnemonic: 儿 looks like a little person with legs spread wide, learning to walk — a son. 子 is a child.
饭 (cooked rice/meal) + 店 (shop). A shop that serves meals — restaurant!
飞 (to fly) + 机 (machine). A flying machine — airplane!
分 (to divide) + 钟 (bell/clock). Dividing the clock into parts — minutes.

mnemonicData.story: Dividing the clock into parts — minutes.

mnemonic: 高 (tall/high) + 兴 (excitement). High excitement — happy!
工 (labor, looks like a beam between floor and ceiling) + 作 (to make). Making with labor — work!
汉 (Han people) + 语 (language). The language of the Han people — Chinese!
好 (good) + 吃 (eat). Good to eat — delicious!
后 (after/behind) + 面 (face/side). The back face of something — behind.
口 (mouth) + 丩 (twist). Your mouth twists open to call out someone's name.
今 (now/present) + 天 (day). The present day — today!
看 (look) + 见 (perceive). You look and actually perceive — you see it!
老 (old/experienced) + 师 (master). An experienced master — a teacher!
口 (mouth) + 马 (horse). Your mouth gallops forward like a horse with a question — right?
米 (uncooked rice, looks like grains scattered on a plant) + 饭 (cooked meal). Rice prepared as a meal.
名 = 夕 (evening) + 口 (mouth). In the dark evening, you call out with your mouth — saying your name! 字 = a child 子 under a roof 宀, being given a name.
明 = 日 (sun) + 月 (moon). After the sun and moon cycle once more — tomorrow!
口 (mouth) + 那 (that). Mouth asking about 'that' one — which one? Where?
阝(place) + 刀 (knife) + 二. Pointing a knife at that place over there — that!
口 (mouth) + 尼 (nun). A mouth gently asking like a patient nun — and you?

mnemonicData.story: A mouth gently asking like a patient nun — and you?

mnemonic: 朋 = two 月 (moons) side by side — two people close as twin moons. 友 = two hands reaching out together.

mnemonicData.story: two hands reaching out together.

mnemonic: 漂 has 氵(water) — beauty that flows like water. 亮 has 高 (high) + 几 — shining high and bright. Beautiful!
苹 = 艹 (grass/plant) + 平 (flat/level). 果 = 田 (field) + 木 (tree). The level fruit on a tree — an apple!
前 (front/before) + 面 (face/side). The front face of something — in front of.
认 = 讠(words) + 人 (person). 识 = 讠(words) + 只 (only). Trading words with a person — getting to know them!
商 (commerce/merchant) + 店 (shop). A merchant's shop — a store!
上 (upper) + 午 (noon). The upper half before noon — morning!
讠(words) + 隹 (short-tailed bird). Who is that bird you're talking about? Who?
什 = 亻(person) + 十 (ten). 么 = tiny/small. A person with ten small questions — what?
时 = 日 (sun) + 寸 (inch). 候 = 亻(person) + waiting. Measuring the sun inch by inch — waiting for the right time.
水 (water) + 果 (fruit). Juicy, water-filled fruit!
睡 = 目 (eye) + 垂 (droop). 觉 = to feel. Your eyes are drooping — time to sleep!
天 (sky/heaven) + 气 (air/vapor). The air in the sky — weather!
同 (same) + 学 (study). People who study the same things — classmates!

mnemonicData.story: People who study the same things — classmates!

mnemonic: 喜 = 士 (scholar) + 口 (mouth) + 豆 (bean). A scholar happily eating beans! 欢 = joy. Happy and joyful — to like!

mnemonicData.story: A scholar happily eating beans!  joy.

mnemonic: A line with a stroke hanging below it — something is underneath. Below!
下 (lower) + 午 (noon). The lower half after noon — afternoon!
先 (first/before) + 生 (born/life). One who was born before you — an elder, Mr./Sir.
现 (appear/present) + 在 (at/exist). Appearing and existing — right now!
相 (mutual/appearance) + 心 (heart). Your heart examines appearances — thinking and wanting.

mnemonicData.story: Your heart examines appearances — thinking and wanting.

mnemonic: A vertical line with two small dots — something being divided into tiny pieces. Small!
小 (small/young) + 姐 (older sister, 女 woman + 且 moreover). A young woman — Miss!
星 = 日 (sun) + 生 (born). 期 = a period of time. A period marked by the birth of new suns — a week of days!
学 (to study) + 生 (born/life). A life devoted to study — a student!
学 = a child 子 under a roof with hands guiding. 习 = feathers 羽 practicing flight. Learning to fly — studying!

mnemonicData.story: a child under a roof with hands guiding.  feathers practicing flight.

mnemonic: 学 (study) + 校 (compare/school, 木 wood + 交 cross). Where students cross paths to study — school!
衣 looks like a robe with flowing sleeves. 服 = 月 (body) + 又 (hand) serving. What your body wears — clothes!
医 = 匸 (box) + 矢 (arrow). Removing arrows from wounds! 生 (life). One who saves lives — doctor!

mnemonicData.story: Removing arrows from wounds!  .

mnemonic: 医 (medicine/heal) + 院 (courtyard/institution). A medical institution — hospital!
椅 = 木 (wood) + 奇 (strange/wonderful). A wonderful wooden invention to sit on — a chair!
怎 = 乍 (suddenly) + 心 (heart). 么 = what. Your heart suddenly wonders — how?
怎么 (how) + 样 (manner/appearance). How is the manner of things — how about it?
中 (middle) + 午 (the noon hour). The middle of the day — noon!
亻(person) + 主 (master/owner). A person who is master of their place — they live there!
桌 = 卜 + 日 on top of 木 (wood). A flat wooden surface lit by the sun — a table!
另 (other) + 刂 (knife). A knife cutting you off — don't do that!
Looks like long flowing hair — stretching out long!
A sprout 屮 pushing up through the ground — coming out!
穴 (cave/hole) + 牙 (tooth). Threading teeth through a hole — like putting on clothes, threading your body through!

mnemonicData.story: Threading teeth through a hole — like putting on clothes, threading your body through!

mnemonic: 冫(ice) + 欠 (owe/lack). Each time the ice melts, you count another occurrence.
Two people 人人 one behind the other — following from one place to another.

mnemonicData.story: Two people one behind the other — following from one place to another.

mnemonic: 钅(metal/gold) + 昔 (past). The gold from the past turned out to be fake — wrong!
打 (hit/strike) + 电话 (electric speech). Striking up an electric conversation — making a call!
打 (hit/strike) + 篮球 (basket ball). Hitting the basket ball — playing basketball!
大 (big) + 家 (family). One big family — everyone!
至 (reach) + 刂 (knife). Cutting through to reach your destination — arrive!
彳(step) + 日 (sun) + 寸 (inch). Steps measured by the sun, inch by inch — how well you do something.

mnemonicData.story: Steps measured by the sun, inch by inch — how well you do something.

mnemonic: 竹 (bamboo) + 寺 (temple). Waiting at a bamboo temple — patiently waiting.

mnemonicData.story: Waiting at a bamboo temple — patiently waiting.

mnemonic: 弟 has 弓 (bow) + a small figure. The younger one still learning to use the bow — little brother!
第 (ordinal prefix) + 一 (one). The number one position — first!
忄(heart) + 董 (to direct). Your heart directs you to comprehend — to understand!
又 (hand) + 寸 (inch). Your hand measures exactly one inch — correct!
房 = 户 (door) + 方 (square). 间 = 门 (gate) + 日 (sun). A square space behind a door where sunlight enters — a room!
非 (not) + 常 (ordinary). Not ordinary at all — extremely!
服务 (to serve) + 员 (person/member). A person who serves — waiter!
公共 (public) + 汽车 (automobile). A public automobile — a bus!
公 (public/official) + 司 (manage). Officially managing business — a company!
中 (middle) + 一 + 贝 (shell/money). A pile of shells (ancient money) — expensive!
辶 (walk) + 寸 (inch). Walking inch by inch through time — something that has passed.

mnemonicData.story: Walking inch by inch through time — something that has passed.

mnemonic: 辶 (walk) + 不 (not). Still walking, not stopping — still going, also continuing!
还 (still) + 是 (is). Is it still this or that — or?
孩 = 子 (child) + 亥 (last). 子 (child). The little one at the end of the family line — a child!
A window 囗 covered with soot 灬 — everything is dark and black!
纟(silk) + 工 (work). The silk workers dye fabric — red silk!
艹 (plant) + 化 (transform). A plant that transforms into something beautiful — a flower!
欢 (joy) + 迎 (to greet). Greeting with joy — welcome!
火车 (fire vehicle = train) + 站 (stand/station). Where the fire vehicle stops — train station!
机 (machine/airplane) + 场 (field/ground). The field where airplanes land — airport!
鸡 (chicken) + 蛋 (egg). What the chicken produces — an egg!
亻(person) + 牛 (cow). A person counts their cows one piece at a time — a measure word for items.
教 (teach) + 室 (room). A room for teaching — classroom!
姐 = 女 (woman) + 且 (moreover/also). The woman who is moreover older than you — big sister!
介 = 人 (person) between two lines. 绍 = 纟(silk) + 召 (summon). A person weaving connections, summoning others — introducing!

mnemonicData.story: A person weaving connections, summoning others — introducing!

mnemonic: 辶 (walk) + 斤 (axe/short). A short walk — near!
辶 (walk) + 井 (well). Walking into the well area — entering!

mnemonicData.story: Walking into the well area — entering!

mnemonic: 京 (capital) + 尤 (especially). Especially in the capital, things happen at once — then, immediately!
觉 = 学 (study) + 见 (see). 得 = to obtain. Studying what you see and obtaining a feeling — to feel/think!
Both characters have 口 (mouth) — a drink for the mouth. 加 (add) + 非 (not ordinary). Not your ordinary drink — coffee!
开 (open) + 始 (begin, 女 woman + 台 platform). Opening the platform — starting!

mnemonicData.story: Opening the platform — starting!

mnemonic: 考 = 老 (old) with a twist — the elders test you. 试 = 讠(words) + 式 (style). Words in a formal style — an exam!
可 (can) + 能 (able). If you can and are able — it's possible!
可 (can/approve) + 以 (use/by). Approved for use — you may!
讠(words) + 果 (fruit). Words bearing fruit — a lesson!
忄(heart) + 夬 (decisive). A heart that decides quickly — fast!
快 (quick) + 乐 (joy/music). Quick to feel joy — happy!
A complex character showing separation — away from!
一 (one) with two 人 (people) inside — a pair, two of something.
足 (foot) + 各 (each). Each foot takes a step on the path — road!
旅 (journey) + 游 (swim/roam). Journeying and roaming — traveling!

mnemonicData.story: Journeying and roaming — traveling!

mnemonic: Like 买 (buy) but with 十 (ten) on top — selling ten things at once!

mnemonicData.story: Like but with on top — selling ten things at once!

mnemonic: 忄(heart) + 曼 (extended/prolonged). A heart that is prolonged and extended — slow!
忄(heart) + 亡 (die/perish). Your heart is dying from being so busy!
A mother 母 with a stroke — every mother cares for each child.
妹 = 女 (woman) + 未 (not yet). The woman not yet grown up — little sister!
Looks like a traditional Chinese double door — a gate!
田 (field) + 力 (strength). Strength in the field — traditionally male!
你 (you) + 心 (heart). You, with heart — the respectful, polite 'you'!
牛 (cow) + 奶 (milk/breast, 女 woman + 乃). What comes from the cow — milk!
A figure kneeling gracefully — the character for woman.
旁 (side) + 边 (edge). At the side edge — beside!
跑 = 足 (foot) + 包 (wrap). 步 = 止 (stop) + 少 (few). Feet wrapping the ground with few stops — running!

mnemonicData.story: Feet wrapping the ground with few stops — running!

mnemonic: 便 = 亻(person) + 更 (more). 宜 (suitable). More suitable for a person's wallet — cheap!
西 (west) + 示 (show). Show this to go west — a ticket!
妻 = a woman 女 with a hand holding a broom. 子 (child). The woman of the house — wife!

mnemonicData.story: a woman with a hand holding a broom.  .

mnemonic: 起 (rise) + 床 (bed, 广 shelter + 木 wood). Rising from the wooden bed — getting up!
十 (ten) with an extra stroke — ten times a hundred makes a thousand!
铅 (lead, 钅metal + 几) + 笔 (brush/pen, 竹 bamboo + 毛 hair). A lead-tipped bamboo writing tool — pencil!
日 (sun) + 青 (green/blue). The sun shining on a blue-green sky — clear weather!
讠(words) + 上 (up). Words that lift restrictions — to let, to allow!
日 (day) + 记 (record). A daily record — a diary!
上 (go up/to) + 班 (shift/class). Going to your shift — going to work!
身 (body, looks like a person with a big belly) + 体 = 亻(person) + 本 (root). A person's root — their body/health!
生 (born/arise) + 病 (illness, 疒 sickness + 丙). Illness arises — getting sick!
生 (born/birth) + 日 (day). The day you were born — birthday!
手 (hand) + 表 (surface/display). A display on your hand — wristwatch!
手 (hand) + 机 (machine). A machine in your hand — cell phone!
疒 (illness) + 叟 (old man). An old man weakened by illness — thin!
说 (speak) + 话 (words/speech). Speaking words — talking!

mnemonicData.story: Speaking words — talking!

mnemonic: 辶 (walk) + 关 (close/care). Walking to someone you care about — to give or send!
虽 = 虫 (insect) + 口 (mouth). 然 = 然 (so/correct). Even though an insect speaks — although!
宀 (roof) + 匕 (spoon). Something under a roof, but not a person — it!

mnemonicData.story: Something under a roof, but not a person — it!

mnemonic: 踢 = 足 (foot) + 易 (easy). 足球 = foot ball. Kicking a ball with your foot — soccer!
是 (is) + 页 (page). What is on the page — a question/topic!
跳 = 足 (foot) + 兆 (omen). 舞 = dancing figure. Feet moving like an omen of joy — dancing!

mnemonicData.story: dancing figure. Feet moving like an omen of joy — dancing!

mnemonic: 夕 (evening) + 卜 (divination). Divining under the evening sky, outside the walls — outside!
宀 (roof) + 元 (origin/first). Under the roof from start to finish — complete!
王 (king) + 元 (origin). Even kings need to return to their origins and play!
晚 = 日 (sun) + 免 (exempt). The sun is exempt from shining — evening! 上 (on/during).
彳(step) + 主 (master). Stepping toward the master — heading in a direction!
为 (for/because) + 什么 (what). For what reason — why?
门 (door) + 口 (mouth). A mouth at the door — asking to come in!

mnemonicData.story: A mouth at the door — asking to come in!

mnemonic: 问 (ask) + 题 (topic). Asking about a topic — a question or problem!
氵(water) + 先 (first). Water first — the first step is to wash!
西 (west) + 瓜 (melon). The melon from the west — watermelon!
希 (rare/scarce) + 望 (gaze/expect). Gazing at something rare — hoping!

mnemonicData.story: Gazing at something rare — hoping!

mnemonic: 小 (small) + 时 (time). A small unit of time — an hour!
竹 (bamboo) + 夭 (young/tender). Young bamboo bending in the wind — like a smiling face!

mnemonicData.story: Young bamboo bending in the wind — like a smiling face!

mnemonic: 亲 (close/parent) + 斤 (axe). Cutting fresh wood with an axe — new!
女 (woman) + 生 (born). The name a woman is born with — surname!
休 = 亻(person) + 木 (tree). A person leaning against a tree — resting! 息 = 自 (self) + 心 (heart). Your heart calms itself.

mnemonicData.story: A person leaning against a tree — resting!  .

mnemonic: 雨 (rain) + 彐 (hand). Rain that you can hold in your hand — snow!
颜 = 彦 (elegant) + 页 (page/face). 色 (color). The elegant colors on a face — color!
眼 = 目 (eye) + 艮 (stubborn/steady). 睛 = 目 (eye) + 青 (green/clear). A steady, clear eye — eyes!
艹 (plant/herb) + 约 (agreement). Plants that have an agreement with your body to heal — medicine!
西 (west) + 女 (woman). A woman looking west, wanting something — to want!
Looks like a snake or river branching — this way and also that way!
已 (already/stop) + 经 (pass through). Having already passed through — already!
一 (one) + 起 (rise). Rising as one — together!
一 (one) + 下 (down). One quick downward motion — just a bit!
因 = 囗 (enclosure) + 大 (big). 为 (for). A big reason enclosed — because!
阝(hill/mound) + 月 (moon). The moon behind a hill — shadowy, cloudy!
游 = 氵(water) + 方 (direction) + 子 (child). 泳 = 氵(water) + 永 (eternal). A child finding their way through water forever — swimming!

mnemonicData.story: A child finding their way through water forever — swimming!

mnemonic: 右 = a hand (ナ) + 口 (mouth). Your right hand near your mouth. 边 (side). The right side!
Looks like a fish with a head, body, and tail fin — fish!
辶 (walk) + 元 (origin). Walking far from your origin — far!
运 = 辶 (walk) + 云 (cloud). 动 = 云 (cloud) + 力 (strength). Moving with the strength of clouds — exercise!
早 = 日 (sun) + 十 (ten). The sun at ten o'clock height. 上 (on). Early in the day — morning!

mnemonicData.story: The sun at ten o'clock height.  .

mnemonic: 丈 (ten feet tall) + 夫 (man). A man who stands ten feet tall — husband!
扌(hand) + 戈 (weapon). A hand searching for a weapon — looking for something!

mnemonicData.story: A hand searching for a weapon — looking for something!

mnemonic: 羊 (sheep) + 目 (eye). Keeping an eye on the sheep — an ongoing, continuous action!
十 (ten) + 具 (tool). Ten genuine tools — really, truly authentic!
正 (straight/correct) + 在 (at). Right at this moment, in the correct place — right now doing something!

mnemonicData.story: Right at this moment, in the correct place — right now doing something!

mnemonic: 知 = 矢 (arrow) + 口 (mouth). 道 = way/path. An arrow from your mouth hits the right path — you know!
准 = 冫(ice) + 隹 (bird). 备 = 夂 (go) + 田 (field). A bird on ice getting ready to fly to the fields — preparing!

mnemonicData.story: A bird on ice getting ready to fly to the fields — preparing!

mnemonic: 自 (self) + 行 (go/travel) + 车 (vehicle). A self-propelled vehicle — bicycle!
土 (earth) + a running figure on top. A person running on the earth — walking/going!

mnemonicData.story: A person running on the earth — walking/going!

mnemonic: 日 (sun) + 取 (take). Taking the sun — reaching the most, the highest!
左 = a hand (ナ) + 工 (work). The hand that works. 边 (side). The left side!
